author: nikkivaddepelli
message: feat(curriculum): Add questions about react basics (#56540)

files.patch:
@@ -17,439 +17,440 @@ Answer all of the questions below correctly to pass the quiz. #### --text-- -Placeholder question +How do you handle a click event in a React component? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +`` --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +`` --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +`` #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +`` ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +Which of the following is NOT a method for conditional rendering in React? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +Ternary operators --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +Logical `&&` operator --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +`switch` statements #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +`setTimeout` ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What does `` do? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +Wraps components with adding extra DOM nodes. --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +Creates a new HTML element. --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +Deletes an existing element. #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +Wraps components without adding extra DOM nodes. ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What is the purpose of React Context? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +Managing component styles. --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +Passing data through the component. --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +Controlling component re-renders. #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +Passing data through the component tree without props. ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +Which of the following is TRUE about JSX? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +JSX must always be written in separate files from JavaScript. --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +JSX cannot use JavaScript expressions. --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +JSX is not recommended for React applications. #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +JSX allows writing HTML within JavaScript code. ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What is a con of using Vanilla JS instead of a framework? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +Automatic state management. --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +Built-in routing capabilities. --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +Declarative UI rendering. #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +Increased verbosity and manual DOM manipulation. ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +How does a single-page application typically update the view? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +By making a full server reload. --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +By reloading the entire HTML document. --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +By using server-side rendering only. #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +By updating only the necessary parts of the page. ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What is the correct way to create a functional React component? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +Using classes only. --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +Using the `React.Component` only. --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +Using JavaScript constructors. #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +Using the `function` keyword or arrow functions. ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +Which of the following is not a valid JSX element? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +`
` --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +`Hello World` --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +`` #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +`` ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +Which of the following is an example of a meta framework for React? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +Vue.js --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +Angular --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +Svelte #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +Next.js ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What tool would you use to bootstrap a new React project? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +Webpack --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +npm --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +Babel #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +Vite ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What command installs dependencies listed in `package.json`? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +`npm run` --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +`npm update` --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +`npm build` #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +`npm install` ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +How would you pass a `name` prop to a child component? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +`` --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +`` --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +`` #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +`` ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What is the correct way to conditionally render a component? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +`` --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +`isLoggedIn` --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +`` #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +`{isLoggedIn ? : }` ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +In a child component, how do you access the `name` prop passed from a parent component? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +`this.props.name` --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +`this.name` --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +`{props}.name` #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +`props.name` ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What is the correct way to add an inline style in React? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +`style={{ color: blue }}` --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +`style="color: blue"` --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +`style: { color: 'blue' }` #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +`style={{ color: 'blue' }}` ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What is the correct way to conditionally render a React component? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +Using `if` statements inside JSX. --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +Declaring a new component inside a `render()` method. --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +Using `while` loops inside JSX. #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +Using ternary operators or logical `&&` operators within JSX. ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What causes a React component to re-render? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +Directly modifying the state variable. --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +Calling the `render()` method. --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +Recompiling the project. #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +Changing the state using `setState`. ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +How would you specify a required `name` prop using `PropTypes`? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +`name: PropTypes.bool` --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +`name: PropTypes.array.isRequired` --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +`name: PropTypes.string` #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +`name: PropTypes.string.isRequired` ### --question-- #### --text-- -Placeholder question +What file is used to define project dependencies in a React/Node.js project? #### --distractors-- -Placeholder distractor 1 +`package.lock.json` --- -Placeholder distractor 2 +`index.html` --- -Placeholder distractor 3 +`webpack.config.js` #### --answer-- -Placeholder answer +`package.json` +
